        Initializes list of countries in the country combo field

      • actionSaveButton

        public void actionSaveButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Action event for the save button. This will attempt to update the database and then redirect back to the Customers tableview to display newly modified customer. Appropriate error message will display if a field is blank. Upon selection of a country, the division will update to reflect only options underneath the selected country.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - event for save button when modifying a customer

      • actionCancelButton

        public void actionCancelButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Action event for the cancel button. Upon clicking the button, it will redirect the user back to the main Customers tableview.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - event for cancel button
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - addresses unhandled exception for load

      • actionCountryLoad

        public void actionCountryLoad​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Loads associated/matching division information when country is selected
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - event to load division combo once country is selected

      • getCustomerInfo

        public void getCustomerInfo​(Customer customer)
                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method gets the selected customer data from the database and displays it in the appropriate fields.
        Parameters:
        customer - selects customer information
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - addresses unhandled SQL exceptions
